com.software.reuze

Class mpb_NodeDiscreteFiniteFullCPT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.mp_a_Node
      • com.software.reuze.mpb_NodeDiscreteFiniteFullCPT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    mpb_i_Node, mpb_i_NodeDiscrete, mpb_i_NodeDiscreteFinite

    public class mpb_NodeDiscreteFiniteFullCPT
extends mp_a_Node
implements mpb_i_NodeDiscreteFinite
    Default implementation of the FiniteNode interface that uses a fully specified Conditional Probability Table to represent the Node's conditional distribution.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
